backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining item, user, and profile types, managing item IDs, user profiles, access control, and helper utilities for email validation and campus membership checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for audit and tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the main TypeScript application module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps all pages with ThemeProvider, layout, header, footer, and profile gate.
frontend/src/components/AddItemModal.tsx: Modal component for creating marketplace items with image handling, validation, and categorized error display.
frontend/src/components/AuthResolutionEr: UI screen showing timeout, access-denied, or generic errors during auth resolution with retry and logout controls.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmati: Alert dialog prompting users to confirm item deletion with optional loading state.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAddButto: Renders a floating circular add button with a plus icon that triggers an onClick handler.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays the site footer with branding, quick links, an about section, and a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the responsive site header with navigation, search, auth handling, and profile menu integration.
frontend/src/components/ItemCard.tsx: Shows an item preview card with image, pricing, details, badges, and optional contact or delete actions.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Provides a modal for login or signup using Internet Identity with loading states and intent handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileAvatarMen: Displays a user avatar dropdown with profile info and a logout option using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Manages user onboarding and profile creation steps, validating email and storing onboarding answers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes related queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorInitGuard.ts: Initializes the backend actor with timeout/error handling and exposes status and retry controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and client initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data-fetching and mutation hooks for user profiles, onboarding, and other backend interactions using the guarded actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS theme variables, dark mode styles, typography, and custom marketplace utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, providing query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page describing UniXange’s mission, features, and purpose.
frontend/src/pages/BuySection.tsx: Displays items for sale with filtering, handles deletion, network errors, and owner checks.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Static contact page showing support, feedback, and help information with icons.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Homepage showing hero section, category shortcuts, and previews of recent buy and rental items.
frontend/src/pages/LostFoundSection.tsx: Manages lost and found items with tabs, item creation, deletion, authentication, and profile validation.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, sharing, security, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/RentSection.tsx: Displays rental items, supports adding and deleting listings with authentication and profile checks, and handles network errors.
frontend/src/pages/SellSection.tsx: Component showing the user’s sell listings with add/delete item workflows, authentication checks, and network/profile error handling.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Static Terms of Service page outlining rules, eligibility, responsibilities, and liability.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitErrors.ts: Defines timeout error markers and helpers for identifying and creating actor initialization timeout errors.
frontend/src/utils/adminEmailAllowlist.t: Provides an admin email allowlist and utilities to check or retrieve allowlisted admin emails.
frontend/src/utils/authIntent.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears a user’s login/signup intent in sessionStorage for auth flows.
frontend/src/utils/icRejectionErrors.ts: Utilities to detect and parse IC rejection errors, including stopped-canister cases and canister ID extraction.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout and returns a consistent timeout error on expiration.
Converts raw errors into user‑friendly messages, handling IC, timeout, auth, and network cases.
frontend/src/utils/universityEmail.ts: Validates university or allowlisted admin emails and returns corresponding error messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across routing and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, defining content paths, and extending theme with custom colors, radii, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing known IC initialization issues, stopped-canister errors, and feature requirements for error handling and actor creation fixes.
